mapper.select: SELECT kc.weight, kc.type_id typeId, cu.name, cu.id uid FROM kf_kpi_count kc, kf_corp_user cu WHERE 1 = 1 AND kc.type = 2 AND cu.id = #{uid} AND kc.uid = cu.id AND cu.level2_id = #{departmentId} AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(first_check_time) BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}) GROUP BY kc.type_id

SELECT result.* FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.type_id typeId, p.title,
IF (a.is_special = 1, "是", "否") isSpecial, x.realname AS pubUser, z.realname AS checkUser, p.create_time createTime, a.first_check_time firstCheckTime, ( CASE WHEN a.article_type <= 4 THEN '文章' WHEN a.article_type = 5 THEN '图集' WHEN a.article_type = 6 THEN '视频' ELSE '直播' END ) AS articleTypeName, ( CASE WHEN a.article_type = 1 THEN '纯文本' WHEN a.article_type = 2 THEN '文本+图片' WHEN a.article_type = 3 THEN '文本+视频' WHEN a.article_type = 4 THEN '文本＋图片＋视频' WHEN a.article_type = 5 THEN '图集' WHEN a.article_type = 6 THEN '视频' ELSE '直播' END ) AS articleShapeName, ktc.`name` workTypeName, a.weight, ( SELECT count(0) FROM kf_kpi_count WHERE type_id = a.type_id ) authorNum, a.remarks FROM kf_kpi_count a LEFT JOIN kf_content p ON a.type_id = p.id LEFT JOIN kf_admin_user x ON p.create_uid = x.id LEFT JOIN kf_admin_user z ON a.first_check_id = z.id LEFT JOIN kf_kpi_type_config ktc ON a.work_type = ktc.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.type = 2 AND a.uid = #{uid} AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.first_check_time) BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}) ) result WHERE 1 = 1
AND result.articleTypeName = #{articleTypeName}
AND ( result.typeId = #{title} OR result.title = #{title} )

SELECT id, type_id, `type`, work_type FROM kf_kpi_count WHERE `type` IN (4, 9) AND pv_finish_time IS NULL AND first_check_time IS NOT NULL AND first_check_time >= #{startDate} AND first_check_time < #{endDate}
